about_the_game:
Help Rudy and his friends to restore the balance in a fragmented world.
Immerse yourself in the world of winged cats and use the Yarn Balls to defeat cunning enemies.
Yarn Guardians is a 2D action-adventure that combines elements of shoot'em up games with the open level structure of Metroidvania games in a cute twin-stick shooter.
Play a small part of the campaign with a friend or challenge up to three friends in Versus mode.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Fedora 25, Ubuntu 16.04, SteamOS, Mint 18
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 11 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core M / Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Yarn Guardians is a 2D Action-Adventure in which you play as cute flying cats that fight enemies with powerful Yarn Balls! Play the story campaign alone or with a friend. You can also challenge up to three friends in the versus mode.
